meanings.sent1: The presweetened lemonade was perfect for the hot day.
meanings.sent2: I prefer to buy presweetened tea because I don't like adding sugar.
meanings.sent3: The presweetened cookies were so sugary, they made my teeth ache.
meanings.sent4: Her presweetened smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The presweetened candy melted in my mouth, leaving a sweet taste.

meanings.definition: To add sugar or sweetener before consumption.
meanings.sent1: She presweetened the coffee before serving it to her guests.
meanings.sent2: I always presweetened my oatmeal to save time in the morning.
meanings.sent3: He presweetened his jokes with a touch of humor to make them more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: The chef presweetened the sauce to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent5: Presweetened drinks are convenient for those who don't like adding sugar themselves.
